name: atomic-write-file-request
description: Request to write data to a file object atomically, using either stream or record access methods.

fields.name: file-identifier
fields.description: The object identifier of the file to write to.

fields.name: access-method

options.name: stream-access

fields.name: file-start-position
fields.description: The starting byte position in the file.

fields.name: file-data
fields.description: The data to write to the file.

options.description: Write data to the file as a stream of bytes.

options.name: record-access

fields.name: file-start-record
fields.description: The starting record number in the file.

fields.name: record-count
fields.description: The number of records to write.

fields.name: file-record-data
fields.description: A list of records to write to the file.

options.description: Write data to the file as a series of records.

fields.description: The access method and data to write.
